headline: PTC positioned as a Leader and Ace Performer in the 2025 SPARK Matrix™: Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) for Regulated Industries, 2025 by QKS Group
summary: Pune, India, Oct. 31, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The QKS Group SPARK Matrix™ provides competitive analysis & ranking of the leading Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) for Regulated Industries vendors. PTC, with its comprehensive technology and customer experience management, has received strong ratings across the parameters of technology excellence and customer impact. QKS Group announced that it has named PTC a Technology Leader and Ace Performer in the analysis of global SPARK MatrixTM: Appl
